body_html:
This is great, thanks!
Maybe for a future commit, it would be nice to use the nn.init methods for initialization, inclusive in the documentation. I think it would be simpler for the users maybe

body:
This is great, thanks!
Maybe for a future commit, it would be nice to use the `nn.init` methods for initialization, inclusive in the documentation. I think it would be simpler for the users maybe
